children.structure_process: Episodic-Structure is composed of discrete episodes or scenes linked by a loose thematic or narrative thread rather than a tightly knit plot

children.examples: The Twilight Zone, Black Mirror, Fargo (TV series)

children.terminology: Episode Introduction → Setting and context for the scene
Development of Episode → Action and interaction within the episode
Episode Climax → Peak moment or conflict of the episode
Transition or Linking Sequence → Bridge connecting episodes
New Episode Introduction → Start of next distinct episode
Episode Resolution / Closure → Ending or conclusion of an episode
